p:
We further checked whether the cis- or trans-eQTLs for the top 34 BP signature genes are associated with other diseases or traits in the NHGRI GWAS catalog [ 14]. We identified 12 cis-eQTLs (for 8 genes) and 6 trans-eQTLs (for 6 genes) that are associated with other diseases or traits in the NHGRI GWAS catalog [ 14] (
Table 4 ).
